content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) that processes copper ore into copper plates

### Iron plate factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) that processes iron ore into iron plates

### Electronic circuit factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts electronic circuits using iron plates, copper cables, and iron gear wheels

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts copper cables using copper plates

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure you have all required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, copper cables require copper plates, which must be produced in a furnace.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace without required fuel
- Make sure you have the necessary fuel (e.g., coal) in your inventory before attempting to insert it into a furnace.

### Errors when extracting items but being too far from the target entity
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract items from before executing the extraction command.

### Errors when placing items into a furnace that has no ingredients to smelt
- Check the inventory of the furnace to ensure it has the necessary ingredients before attempting to insert items.

### Errors when inserting items into a furnace that has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to insert items. If the furnace is empty, it will not process any materials.
